mapper.sql: select t1.material_code,t1.quantity from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` > '1' and t.`status` not in ( '4','7') and t.order_type = '1' and t1.material_code is not null

select t1.material_code,t1.acpt_quantity quantity from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_send t1 on t.order_code = t1.order_code where t.`status` = '7' and t.order_type = '1' and t1.material_code is not null

select t1.material_code,t1.quantity from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` > '1' and t.`status` not in ( '4','7') and t.order_type = '2' and t1.material_code is not null

select t1.material_code,t1.quantity from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code where t.`status` = '7' and t.order_type = '2' and t1.material_code is not null

select t.*,t1.material_name as materialName,t1.material_model as materialModel,t1.measure_unit as measureUnit from t_pss_material_stock t left join t_pss_material_mgt t1 on t.material_code = t1.material_code where 1=1
and t.material_code in
#{item}
order by t.id

select * from (SELECT t1.id, t1.order_type orderType, t80.note orderTypeName, t1.send_type sendType, t81.note sendTypeName, t1.application_date applicationDate, t1.order_code orderCode, t1.supplier_code supplierCode, t2.supplier_name supplierName, t1.applicant, t3. NAME userName, t.material_code materialCode, t.material_name materialName,
CASE WHEN t1.`status` > '1' AND t1.`status` NOT IN ('4', '6','7') AND t1.order_type = '1' and t1.send_type ='2' THEN t.quantity
ELSE 0 END quantityToIn,
CASE WHEN t1.`status` = '7' AND t1.order_type = '1' THEN t.acpt_quantity ELSE 0 END quantityIn,
CASE WHEN t1.`status` > '1' AND t1.`status` NOT IN ('4', '7') AND t1.order_type = '2' THEN t.quantity ELSE 0 END quantityToOut,
CASE WHEN t1.`status` = '7' AND t1.order_type = '2' THEN t.quantity ELSE 0 END quantityOut
FROM t_pss_order t1 LEFT JOIN ( select t.order_code,t1.material_code,t1.material_name,t1.quantity,t2.acpt_quantity from t_pss_order t left join t_pss_material_detail_log t1 on t.order_code = t1.foreign_code left join (select order_code,material_code,sum(acpt_quantity) acpt_quantity from t_pss_material_detail_send group by order_code,material_code ) t2 on t1.foreign_code = t2.order_code and t1.material_code = t2.material_code ) t ON t.order_code = t1.order_code
LEFT JOIN t_pss_dict t80 ON t1.order_type = t80. CODE AND t80.type = 'ddlx' LEFT JOIN t_pss_dict t81 ON t1.send_type = t81. CODE AND t81.type = 'sdfs' LEFT JOIN t_pss_supplier t2 ON t1.supplier_code = t2.supplier_code LEFT JOIN t_pss_user t3 ON t1.applicant = t3.user_id ) A where 1=1 and A.materialCode IS NOT NULL and (A.quantityToIn != 0 or A.quantityIn != 0 or A.quantityToOut != 0 or A.quantityOut != 0 )
and A.materialCode = #{materialStockLogDto.materialCode}
order by A.id desc
